if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 10)) c.getDH().sendDialogue(1339, 0); else c.getDH().sendDialogue(1340, 0);

item.title: [PI] Dialogue help
item.dc:creator: @nikolaww3 nikolaww3
item.description:
@nikolaww3 wrote:

Hey i’m making guards for alkharid and i want it so if you click you’ll pay 10gp and you have it you pass but if you don’t the dialogue closes and sends gamemessage saying “You do not have 10gp”
and if you click who are you they say i am the guard of alkharid help?

case 1337: sendNpcChat2("Hault!", "You shall not pass.", c.talkingNpc, "Border Guard"); //NPC ID = 925 c.nextChat = 1338; break; case 1338: sendOption3("I'll give you 10gp.", "Who are you?", "Nevermind."); break;

Read full topic
